message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you a great deal on this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Can you meet me halfway?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! I can see you're a serious buyer. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I can offer it to you for $110.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $105?
I understand you're trying to stay within your budget, Bob. I can see you're a serious buyer. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to make a profit. I can offer it to you for $115.
I appreciate your willingness to make another concession, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $110?

I can see you're really interested in the product, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession, but I'm getting close to my minimum price. I can offer it to you for $120, but that's as low as I can go.
I appreciate your willingness to make another concession, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $115?
